title: UK Government Response to Independent Review
body: UK Government responds to recommendations from the final report of the independent review.

title: Commonwealth Modern Slavery Act 2018: Guidance for Reporting Entities
body: Australian Government releases guidance to support entities that fall in scope of the reporting requirement.

title: Independent Review of the Modern Slavery Act 2015: Final Report
body: The  final report states stakeholders were clear that the lack of clarity, guidance, monitoring and enforcement in modern slavery statements needed to be addressed to increase compliance and quality.  Includes recommendations.

title: Explore FTSE 100 Dashboards
body: Explore our new interactive dashboards to see how we scored the FTSE 100 company modern slavery statements against 54 indicators
